step1.title: Welcome to Imposter Hunt!
step1.description: A social deduction game where one player is the imposter trying to blend in.

step2.title: Setup Players
step2.description: Add all players who will participate. You need at least 3 players to start the game.
step2.tip: You can add up to 10 players for bigger groups!

step3.title: The Imposter
step3.description: One player is secretly the imposter! Everyone else sees the secret word, but the imposter doesn't. The imposter must blend in and figure out the word.
step3.tip: The imposter can win by guessing the word correctly!

step4.title: The Jester (Optional)
step4.description: With 4+ players, you can enable the Jester role. The Jester's goal is to get eliminated! If the Jester is voted out, they win the game.
step4.tip: The Jester adds chaos - be careful who you vote for!

step5.title: The Sheriff (Optional)
step5.description: With 4+ players, you can enable the Sheriff role. The Sheriff can inspect one player during the game to discover their role.
step5.tip: Use the Sheriff's power wisely - you only get one inspection!

step6.title: Discussion Phase
step6.description: Players take turns describing the secret word without saying it directly. The imposter must try to fit in without knowing the word!
step6.tip: Be vague enough so the imposter can't guess, but clear enough to prove you know it!

step7.title: Voting Phase
step7.description: After discussion, vote to eliminate the player you think is the imposter. The player with the most votes is eliminated.
step7.tip: Pay attention to who seems uncertain or avoids specifics!

step8.title: Win Conditions
step8.description:
• Civilians win by eliminating the imposter
• Imposter wins by guessing the word or surviving to final 2
• Jester wins by getting eliminated
• Sheriff helps civilians find the imposter

aiTutorial.step2Text: Select how many words you want and the difficulty level.
